siteMetadata.title: Tigran Hakobyan's personal blog
siteMetadata.subtitle: Long-form thoughts on building software, developer tools and remote work.

markdownRemark.html:
Here is the list of my side-projects that I currently maintain.

  • Remote Office Hours - I do office hours with strangers who need advice on remote work.
  • Cronhub – Cronhub is a cron monitoring tool for developers.
  • Booknshelf – Booknshelf is a website to keep track of all your books online.
  • Dev Tool Makers – A small community of people who are building tools for developers.
